publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3059 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Transport (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that, during Stage 3 of the Transport (Scotland) Bill, debate on groups of amendments shall, subject to Rule 9.8.4A, be brought to a conclusion by the time limits indicated (each time limit being calculated from when the Stage begins and excluding any periods when other business is under consideration or when the meeting of the Parliament is suspended or otherwise not in progress): Groups 1 to 3 – 40 minutes Groups 4 to 6 – 1 hour and 10 minutes Groups 7 to 11 – 1 hour and 40 minutes Groups 12 to 17 – 2 hours and 25 minutes Supported by: Tavish Scott*
